name: SQL
sqlStatements:
CREATE TABLE `inputtable` (
  `id`  BIGINT NOT NULL,
  `name1`  STRING NOT NULL,
  `num_dou`  DOUBLE NOT NULL,
  `num_float`  FLOAT NOT NULL,
  `num_int`  BIGINT NOT NULL,
  `stringtime`  STRING NOT NULL,
  `cloud_wise_proc_time` AS `proctime`()
) WITH (
  'connector' = 'kafka-0.10',
  'topic' = 'source_sql',
  'properties.bootstrap.servers' = '10.0.9.43:9092',
  'properties.max.poll.records' = '5000',
  'properties.group.id' = 'group1',
  'format' = 'json',
  'json.ignore-parse-errors' = 'true',
  'scan.startup.mode' = 'latest-offset'
);

CREATE TABLE `outputtable` (
  `id`  BIGINT NOT NULL,
  `name1`  STRING,
  `num_dou`  DOUBLE NOT NULL,
  `num_float`  FLOAT NOT NULL,
  `num_int`  BIGINT NOT NULL,
  `stringtime`  STRING NOT NULL,
  `cloud_wise_proc_time`  TIMESTAMP(3)
) WITH (
  'connector' = 'kafka-0.10',
  'topic' = 'sink_sql',
  'properties.bootstrap.servers' = '10.0.9.43:9092',
  'properties.acks' = '1',
  'properties.retries' = '3',
  'properties.batch.size' = '16348',
  'properties.linger.ms' = '0',
  'properties.buffer.memory' = '33554432',
  'json.ignore-parse-errors' = 'true',
  'format' = 'json'
);

INSERT INTO `outputtable`
(SELECT *
FROM `inputtable`);
